# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
Not present

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of:
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment
- Ensure that burner equipment has fuel before using it.
- Examples: burner mining drill, burner inserter

### Errors when using steam equipment
- Ensure that steam equipment is connected to a boiler and a steam engine.
- Example: steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Errors when using electricity equipment
- Ensure that electricity equipment is plugged into an electric network.
- Example: electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Errors when using inserter equipment
- Ensure that inserter equipment has source items before using it.
- Example: burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5)

### Errors when using furnace equipment
- Ensure that furnace equipment has ingredients before using it.
- Example: stone furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0)

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
